text:
Yesterday I noticed my server-status screens displaying weird code between the 
end of the Server Version line and before the Server Built line.  Yesterday 
the code was from the ssl.conf file, from near the end of the files.  It was a 
whole paragraph of comments and code, word-for-word from the file.  There were 
no errors in the log files.  I restarted apache using "apachectl restart" and 
the text went away.  Today I noticed the "MaxSpareServers" word from the 
httpd.conf file in my server-status screen. I have not restarted apache since 
yesterday.  Again there are no errors in the logs.  I cannot restart apache 
today.  

Server Version: Apache/2.2.6 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.6 MaxSpareServers 
Server Built: Nov 20 2007 14:07:33 

I have searched the forums and do not see anything.  

Thank you
creator: csgonan@yahoo.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 43865 ***
creator: rpluem@apache.org
